class.name: SQLiteConnectionParams
class.brief_description: Connection parameters that have to be passed to [method SQLiteConnection.open].

members.member: Path to the database. A new database is automatically created if there is no existing database at the supplied path. Both [code]res://[/code] and [code]user://[/code] keywords can be used to define the path.

Enabling this property opens the database in read-only modus & allows databases to be packaged inside of the PCK. To make this possible, a custom [url=https://www.sqlite.org/vfs.html]VFS[/url] is employed which internally takes care of all the file handling using the Godot API.

The verbosity_level determines the amount of logging to the Godot console that is handy for debugging your (possibly faulty) SQLite queries. [i][b]NOTE:[/b] [constant SQLiteEnums.VerbosityLevel.VERBOSE] and higher levels might considerably slow down your queries due to excessive logging.[/i]
